summary: It's simple: This mod replaces the background music that plays when you fight a dragon with something even more epic *cough*
descriptionHtml:
[size=1][i]This is why you shouldn't leave me alone with internet and Creation Kit...[/i][/size]

[size=4][size=3]Step 1: Download this mod with the manager or manually
Step 2: Install this mod with the manager or place the file into your Skyrim's Data folder[/size][size=1](x86/Steam/SteamApps/common/Skyrim/Data ,if I remember correctly)[/size]
[size=3]Step 3: Now, when you stumple upon a dragon on your travels you might notice a new soundtrack playing in the background[/size][/size]
[size=3]Step 4(optional): [color=#cccccc]WTF[/color][/size]

If you're interested,this is the new soundtrack:

[youtube]eWM2joNb9NE[/youtube]
NOT my song,credits go to [url=https://www.youtube.com/user/songstowearpantsto/featured ]Andrew Huang
[/url]


I wanted to replace music,this was my first thought.
author: McBook
